Features:
* User interface optimized (optimized user interface). Get started faster, do the work in fewer steps, and improve the overall experience of building with the Property inspector, a multiple document interface and workspaces.
* Object Styles (Style object). Define and apply styles to objects selected for fast and consistent format through a project.
* Slide Master (slide shows). Use master slides to create and easily maintain the content and format consistent with the future that meets corporate guidelines.
* Animation effects Rico (professional animation effects). For more impact, seamless import custom animation effects Adobe Flash Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Professional software.
* Multivideo and synchronization support (support for simultaneous work with several videos and video synchronization). Importing video in a wide variety of formats (AVI, MOV, FLV, MPEG) and sync with the project, slides, or a set of slides.
* Accommodation and collaboration through Acrobat.com. Published or hosted e-learning projects underway in Acrobat.com, an Adobe CS Live online service *, and share with students and respondents can access them from virtually anywhere.
* Monitoring and reporting. Meeting basic needs assessment at no additional cost by tracking and reporting key performance metrics such as average score, and approve or disapprove rates, without having to invest in a learning management system.

* In the context of collaborative learning through Twitter. Take advantage of Adobe Twitter widget to create courses that allow students to collaborate with each other, and the author simply by entering your Twitter account. They can ask questions, get answers and access to pre-existing debates.
* Library expanded asset improved. Get a wider set of prebuilt widgets, playing bars, skins, stock animation, images, text captions, buttons and superior aesthetics and ease of use.
